::Spears/SnowCat::

Spears::
She sees Striker get hit and turns to see the preds attacking. "Don't 
they ever take a break?"  She pulled out a quill and extended it into 
a spear.  She threw it as hard as she could at Savage.

SnowCat::
She saw the attacking bots approach the ark.  She ran out in snow 
leopard mode, ready to sink her claws into a pred. She fired her 
optic lazars at Savage, running towards him, passing Spears and 
Striker. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Reptilica/Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> Reptilica stumbles back from Starscream's slap, taking out both 
guns and 
> aiming them at Starscream. With a few barely audible commands into 
his comm, 
> the autoguns aim at Starscream again, ready to fire.
> 
> "Listen," Reptilica says, growling, "You're at the Alliance base, 
and that 
> kind of behaviour will get you killed. On me command, these 
autoguns open 
> fire and kill you. And they'd do the same to Megatron. He's not a 
threat, I 
> don't even think he has a faction to lead."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shot hits Striker in the back, the Maximal spinning around. He 
growls when 
> he sees the attackers coming toward the Ark. Didn't they ever stop?!
> 
> He opens fire on Savage, wondering why these bots were trying to 
destroy time 
> by killing the Ark.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus nods, walking over to Brix and Fliq and helping with 
attatching the 
> panel.
> 
> "Think it'll hold?" he asks, working on it.
